name: Event-onPlayerEnter-Npc-Tron
content: {{event}}onPlayerEnter{{/event}} {{type}}TextAction{{/type}} {{data}}${style-npcHighlight}Tron${style-defaultDescription} says ${style-npcSpeech}Hello User ${data-PlayerName}. Welcome to Incipio PlayerHub #1337.${style-defaultDescription}{{/data}}

name: Event-onTell-conditionalResponse-help-Npc-Tron
content: {{event}}onTell{{/event}} {{keyPhrases}}[ 'help' ]{{/keyPhrases}} {{type}}TextAction{{/type}} {{data}}${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription}says ${style-npcSpeech}Incipio is a pretty straight forward world, there are megamalls and some public areas to socialize with others on this planet. In fact walk from here to the ${style-exitHighlight}north${style-npcSpeech} and we you find a mall. For anything else, and if you have the credits or teleoprt voucher, I recommend teleporting elsewhere.{{/data}}
data: ${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription}says ${style-npcSpeech}Incipio is a pretty straight forward world, there are megamalls and some public areas to socialize with others on this planet. In fact walk from here to the ${style-exitHighlight}north${style-npcSpeech} and we you find a mall. For anything else, and if you have the credits or teleoprt voucher, I recommend teleporting elsewhere.

name: Event-onIdle-say-hello-Npc-Tron
content: {{event}}onIdle{{/event}} {{frequency}}rare{{/frequency}} {{type}}TextAction{{/type}} {{data}}${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription}says ${style-npcSpeech}Hey User, if you happen upon Flynn or my old User in your adventures tell them I said hello.{{/data}}
data: ${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription}says ${style-npcSpeech}Hey User, if you happen upon Flynn or my old User in your adventures tell them I said hello.

name: Event-onIdle-stranger-Npc-Tron
content: {{event}}onIdle{{/event}} {{frequency}}uncommon{{/frequency}} {{type}}TextAction{{/type}} {{data}}${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription} looks off in the distance at the floating ads and tall buildings, slightly shakes his head and says ${style-npcSpeech}stranger and stranger.{{/data}}
data: ${style-npcHighlight}Tron ${style-defaultDescription} looks off in the distance at the floating ads and tall buildings, slightly shakes his head and says ${style-npcSpeech}stranger and stranger.
